parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa 

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions 

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts a position from [[PositionATL]] to [[PositionASL]] 

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ATLToASL]] pos 

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> pos: [[PositionATL]] - position to convert 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[PositionASL]] 

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ATLToASL]] ([[getPosATL]] [[player]]) [[isEqualTo]] [[getPosASL]] [[player]]</code> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_camPosASL = [[ATLToASL]] [[positionCameraToWorld]] [0,0,0];</code> 

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ASLToATL]], [[AGLToASL]], [[ASLToAGL]], [[getPos]], [[getPosATL]], [[getPosASL]]
</value></part></template>
